alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:50AM CST until February 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Bayou Sara At Saraland affecting Mobile County. For the Bayou Sara...including Saraland...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Bayou Sara At Saraland. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4 feet, Flooding of streets begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 4 feet. An updated river stage reading is expected later this evening. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 3.2 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 4 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/mob. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
